bug.summary: Undefined errno on Mac OS X
bug.description:
Compiling the training tools on OS X produces errors like: <denchmark-code>combine_tessdata.cpp:120:9: error: use of undeclared identifier 'errno' errno = 0; ^ lstmtraining.cpp:93:69: error: use of undeclared identifier 'errno' </denchmark-code>
due to a missing include
